20101228020454.000|20101228020456.000|CC1|THEM BECAUSE OF RUNOFF.         
20101228020456.000|20101228020457.000|CC1|THE ORANGE COUNTY HEALTH        
20101228020457.000|20101228020458.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT SAYS A RAW SEWAGE    
20101228020458.000|20101228020500.000|CC1|SPILL CONTAMINATED THIS WATER.  
20101228020500.000|20101228020502.000|CC1|>> RAW SEWAGE IS DANGEROUS      
20101228020502.000|20101228020502.000|CC1|STUFF.                          
20101228020502.000|20101228020504.000|CC1|IT HAS A LOT OF BACTERIA, AND IF
20101228020504.000|20101228020506.000|CC1|YOU COME INTO CONTACT WITH IT HE

20101228020511.000|20101228020513.000|CC1|DIFFERENT THINGS LIKE           
20101228020513.000|20101228020513.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101228020513.000|20101228020514.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AFTER TWO DAYS OF  
20101228020514.000|20101228020517.000|CC1|PAIN RESULTS FROM WATER SAMPLES 
20101228020517.000|20101228020519.000|CC1|BEACHES WOULD REOPEN.

20101228020523.000|20101228020525.000|CC1|IS PILED UP ON THE SHORT TO BE

20101228020633.000|20101228020635.000|CC1|LISTENING TO THE HOLIDAY
